all.Name: Carousel Side Table
all.Body: The Carousel Side Table is part of our lockdown series which consists of three side tables. The tables were designed in the spirit of whimsy to keep us feeling light during the lengthy Melbourne Lockdown. The tables bases are created with a series of tubes, experimenting with different proportions for each variation. The water-jet cut marble top repeats the scalloped shape of the base. Made from powder coated steel, with a marble top. Idle Hands manufacture every item themselves which means customisation is available to suit each unique space.

all.Name: Mouse Bookshelf
all.Body: The Mouse Collection consists of four pieces, a shelving unit, bookshelf, entry table and shoe rack, which respond to the need for good storage solutions as an essential element of every interior. The bookshelf highlights the gently folded ends of each shelf which adds an understated detail to the clean lines of this contemporary piece. Made from powder coated steel, the shelves are laser cut and folded to form. The coating gives the shelves a hard-wearing surface. Idle Hands manufacture every item themselves which means customisation is available to suit each unique space.

all.Name: Passage Bookends
all.Body: Inspired by arched passageways, these elegant bookends allude to the hidden places your books can take you. Made in powder coated steel, the base slips under your books using their weight to hold the ends in place. This product comes as a pair.

all.Name: Pattypan Side Table
all.Body: The Carousel Side Table is part of our lockdown series which consists of three side tables. The tables were designed in the spirit of whimsy to keep us feeling light during the lengthy Melbourne Lockdown. The tables bases are created with a series of tubes, experimenting with different proportions for each variation. The water-jet cut marble top repeats the scalloped shape of the base. Made from powder coated steel, with a marble top. Idle Hands manufacture every item themselves which means customisation is available to suit each unique space.

all.Name: Sub Bench
all.Body: The Sub Bench is an exploration of an off the shelf piece of rectangular mild steel tube, concentrating on its fundamental qualities – strength, weight and uniformity. The process of creating the bench involved alternating between the faces, one provides strength while the other adds surface area. Each Sub Bench is plated for protection from the environment, it is then powder-coated in a colour of your choice, giving the bench a hard-wearing surface. Idle Hands manufacture every item themselves which means customisation is available to suit each unique space.

all.Name: Tangram Bedside Table
all.Body: The Tangram Bedside Table is a modern and practical design that is carefully made and hardwearing. The design sought to explore the possibilities of an all steel side table, the result is a folded steel shelf which sits atop crossing steel rod legs. Available in a range of powder-coated colours this piece can transform from a stylish classic to a fun accent.

idle-hands.Name: Passage Bookends
idle-hands.Body: Inspired by arched passageways, these elegant bookends allude to the hidden places your books can take you. Made in powder coated steel, the base slips under your books using their weight to hold the ends in place. This product comes as a pair.

idle-hands.Name: Mouse Shelf
idle-hands.Body: The Mouse Collection consists of four pieces, a shelving unit, bookshelf, entry table and shoe rack, which respond to the need for good storage solutions as an essential element of every interior. The shelving unit highlights the gently folded ends of each shelf which adds an understated detail to the clean lines of this contemporary piece. Made from powder coated steel, the shelves are laser cut and folded to form. The coating gives the shelves a hard-wearing surface. Idle Hands manufacture every item themselves which means customisation is available to suit each unique space.

Made from powder coated steel, the shelves are laser cut and folded to form. The coating gives the shelves a hard-wearing surface. Idle Hands manufacture every item themselves which means customisation is available to suit each unique space.

idle-hands.Name: Platform
idle-hands.Body: A versatile piece that suits any room, the Platform Side Table is a happy resting place for your plant, coffee, toast, magazine, vape, cat… etc. The powder-coat finish provides a multitude of colour options as well as durability and weather resistance.

idle-hands.Name: Carousel Side Table
idle-hands.Body: The Carousel Side Table is part of our lockdown series which consists of three side tables. The tables were designed in the spirit of whimsy to keep us feeling light during the lengthy Melbourne Lockdown. The tables bases are created with a series of tubes, experimenting with different proportions for each variation. The water-jet cut marble top repeats the scalloped shape of the base. Made from powder coated steel, with a marble top. Idle Hands manufacture every item themselves which means customisation is available to suit each unique space.

The tables bases are created with a series of tubes, experimenting with different proportions for each variation. The water-jet cut marble top repeats the scalloped shape of the base. Made from powder coated steel, with a marble top. Idle Hands manufacture every item themselves which means customisation is available to suit each unique space.

idle-hands.Name: Sub Bench
idle-hands.Body: The Sub Bench is an exploration of an off the shelf piece of rectangular mild steel tube, concentrating on its fundamental qualities – strength, weight and uniformity. The process of creating the bench involved alternating between the faces, one provides strength while the other adds surface area. Each Sub Bench is plated for protection from the environment, it is then powder-coated in a colour of your choice, giving the bench a hard-wearing surface. Idle Hands manufacture every item themselves which means customisation is available to suit each unique space.

idle-hands.Name: Tangram Bedside Table
idle-hands.Body: The Tangram Bedside Table is a modern and practical design that is carefully made and hardwearing. The design sought to explore the possibilities of an all steel side table, the result is a folded steel shelf which sits atop crossing steel rod legs. Available in a range of powder-coated colours this piece can transform from a stylish classic to a fun accent.

idle-hands.Name: Mouse Bookshelf
idle-hands.Body: The Mouse Collection consists of four pieces, a shelving unit, bookshelf, entry table and shoe rack, which respond to the need for good storage solutions as an essential element of every interior. The bookshelf highlights the gently folded ends of each shelf which adds an understated detail to the clean lines of this contemporary piece. Made from powder coated steel, the shelves are laser cut and folded to form. The coating gives the shelves a hard-wearing surface. Idle Hands manufacture every item themselves which means customisation is available to suit each unique space.
